flavorText: With Olivia distracted, Sigarda tore free from her bindings and summoned her Host of Herons.

foreignData.flavorText: Während Olivia abgelenkt war, riss sich Sigarda von ihren Fesseln los und beschwor ihren Reiherschwarm.
foreignData.name: Sigardas Beschwörungen
foreignData.text: Jede Kreatur, die du kontrollierst und auf der eine +1/+1-Marke liegt, hat Basis-Stärke und -Widerstandskraft 4/4 sowie Flugfähigkeit und ist zusätzlich zu ihren anderen Typen ein Engel.

foreignData.flavorText: Une fois Olivia distraite, Sigarda se libéra de ses liens et appela la Milice des hérons.
foreignData.name: Recrutement de Sigarda
foreignData.text: Les créatures que vous contrôlez avec des marqueurs +1/+1 sur elles ont une force et une endurance de base de 4/4, ont le vol et sont des anges en plus de leurs autres types.

foreignData.flavorText: Approfittando della distrazione di Olivia, Sigarda si liberò dai vincoli e chiamò a sé la sua Schiera degli Aironi.
foreignData.name: Evocazioni di Sigarda
foreignData.text: Le creature con segnalini +1/+1 che controlli hanno forza e costituzione base 4/4, hanno volare e sono Angeli in aggiunta ai loro altri tipi.

foreignData.flavorText: Воспользовавшись тем, что Оливия отвлеклась, Сигарда высвободилась из уз и призвала свой Сонм Цапель.
foreignData.name: Призыв Сигарды
foreignData.text: Существа под вашим контролем с жетонами +1/+1 на них имеют базовую силу и выносливость 4/4, имеют Полет и являются Ангелами в дополнение к своим другим типам.

name: Sigarda's Summons
originalText: Creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them have base power and toughness 4/4, have flying, and are Angels in addition to their other types.

rulings.text: Removing all +1/+1 counters from a creature affected by this ability or removing Sigarda's Summons from the battlefield will cause that creature to revert back to what it was. Notably, this may cause a creature to lose flying after it has been declared as an attacker but before blockers are declared. This may also result in a creature with damage already marked on it being destroyed if that damage is greater than the creature's toughness.

text: Creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them have base power and toughness 4/4, have flying, and are Angels in addition to their other types.
